description:
Caprine is an elegant Facebook Messenger desktop app


What's Changed
- version bumps and lint updates by @sgtcoder in #2136
- Apply Chats title margin for MacOS only by @mquevill in #2134
- Include Marketplace and other unread messages in tray icon number by @mquevill in #2133
- Lint fixes from recent dependency bumps by @mquevill in #2156
- Dropped Snap package since publishing step fails. Working on fixing the issue.
New Contributors
- @sgtcoder made their first contribution in #2136
[!WARNING]
Notice for package maintainers!
Electron version is changed.
Full Changelog: https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/v2.59.3...v2.60.1
